website_summaries.verdict: Provides versatile use for urgent waste disposal.
pros: Great for those who drive professionally and experience unexpected passenger situations
We love that it minimizes odor as well
Used for all types of waste disposal and great for the outdoors
cons: The instructions are a tad over-stated

customer_reviews.title: Greatest product ever invented
customer_reviews.text: Greatest product ever invented. I'd give 10 stars if i could. Just had non weight bearing foot surgery. These are a savior. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, easy to use and no odor
customer_reviews.text: My brother moved into a new home with a glorified shed with no bathroom as the guest quarters. I visited in January and was able to get through the night without having to traverse the rain by using Go on the Go. I used one each night of the five nights I was there. They are simple to use, become solidified immediately and give off no odor so I could just set them on the floor near the door to throw in the trash in the morning. Perfect! I now keep one in the car just in case.
customer_reviews.author: K. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: They are highly recommended if you need something like this (we use them ...
customer_reviews.text: These work very well, for both men and women. They are highly recommended if you need something like this (we use them during hiking). I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore J Pantenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great when traveling in a semi across country
customer_reviews.text: Great when traveling in a semi across country. You can't always get to the restroom and it's great to have a product like this. It works as well as the more expensive brand, other than it doesn't have a zip bag type closure on it, but I never had an issue with anything spilling or leaking from it. They also come with a 15 pack of moist wipes which is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: QuiltergirlTop Contributor: Quilting

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than Travel John and do the trick. I use them for camping and they take care of the one issue I have with camping-having to get out of my tent to go on the middle of the night to go. It smells for a few minutes but as soon as the liquid turns to gel there is no odor. I camp in all weather and these are a must!
customer_reviews.author: Shari Weinman

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I used this and it overflowed and did not keep up with me. I was contacted by their customer service and they replaced my product. I think maybe recieved a bad lot number. They work fine for me now.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: But they are great just in case throw up bags
customer_reviews.text: I keep these in the car for kids incase they get sick. I also used them to take the kids hiking. We never used them for either purpose ( puke or pee). I’m not sure how well they would work for little girls needing to go potty. But they are great just in case throw up bags. I do wish the instructions weren’t written all over the bag. A little weird to have to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Dbarnes

customer_reviews.title: great for camping and emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Good for kids who get car sick , or road trips. Also took on tent camping trip at national park with only out houses, Huge storm and facilities were far- these worked great, set up a few of these with antibacterial wand wipes for middle of the night use. . Also took with kayaking. kept one in purse and car. Could also be life saver if stuck in traffic, in urban areas like NYC tunnels /bridges .
customer_reviews.author: Advocate Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: As a pregnant woman traveling hours on the road for the holidays, this product saved me! No mess and discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have in the emergency kit for the car.
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely a must have for the emergency kit for the car. It is not safe for a car full of girls to pull over on a random side road when there is an emergency bathroom break needed. These have definitely come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY

customer_reviews.title: Traffic jam confidence
customer_reviews.text: After being in hours long traffic, I finally decided to get something to make me feel confident when I cannot get to a restroom. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Berube

customer_reviews.title: Always ready when it is needed.
customer_reviews.text: Peace of mind is what it gives you, it is ready when you need it most. Easy to use and everything you need is included. Great travel buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Mae West

customer_reviews.title: Fear of projectile vomit is real
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had to use yet thankfully. But having on hand is much better than getting hit in the arm with projectile vomit while having an enjoyable leisurely ride threw the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty B

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Practical solution. Works perfectly for those times when you can’t get to a restroom (wilderness), or during cold evenings when you’re sleeping in a room far away from a toilet. Liquid becomes a non-spilling gel.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Good for a female to use.
customer_reviews.text: This worked GREAT for me! I was looking for something to use at night in my campsite, which didn’t have a nearby toilet. It worked like a charm! I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine P. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping. My husband drinks a lot of water and sports drinks throughout the day, and he always has to rush to find a bathroom. These are great for when he can’t.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great for those long drives.
customer_reviews.text: Great for long trips if you have children. You ‘now how they always seem to wait til the last minute when there’s no where to stop. This turns the liquid into a gel, so there’s no risk of spilling.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: A must to keep in car. They are not foolproof...spillage may occur, needs care when using - but they do the trick in an emergency for nr.1 for women. It is a relief to have them.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind in case of being stuck in traffic
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had opportunity to use it but great to have in car for emergencies like being stuck in traffic, illness, too much to drink, etc. Guys and Gals can use it.
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: You better have a tiny bladder!
customer_reviews.text: You better have a pea sized bladder to use these or else you are gonna spill pee all over your hands! I got them to use at rest stops while traveling thinking it would be cleaner. What a mess!
customer_reviews.author: nautiluschelle

customer_reviews.title: hard to discreatly dispose of in public restrroom i believe ...
customer_reviews.text: hard to discreatly dispose of in public restrroom i believe it needs a plain bag to cover with whenleaving the stall.. i carry a brn bag to put into..
customer_reviews.author: L mc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were a life saver on our cross country road trip! I highly recommend these ingenious potty bags!
customer_reviews.author: Dd

customer_reviews.title: Female tested, products does work!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a female and tried it sitting, no leaks or drips as I held it firmly against my skin.
customer_reviews.author: T. T. Lara

customer_reviews.title: Great for car camping
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my tent while camping. They work really well. No having to crawl out of the tent during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry C.

customer_reviews.title: Works 100%
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Instantly starts to solidify liquids. My only complaint is it’s a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Fergisus

customer_reviews.title: Great for pilot to have aboard!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for use in my airplane for those unplanned flight emergencies! Also handy when in the deer hunting stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camping miracle!
customer_reviews.text: This worked incredibly well for me during a camping trip. Easy to use and extremely tidy. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Wiselady3

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for weak bladders on the beach, car, anywhere outside
customer_reviews.author: Erin S

customer_reviews.title: Must have especially with kids!
customer_reviews.text: Go on the Go has saved us so many times! So handy, easy to use, and convenient. Bonus - no odor in the vehicle once kids use it. A must have for all families!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: works great for my car sick prone 4 year old - ...
customer_reviews.text: works great for my car sick prone 4 year old - easy to use for a small child to keep vomit out of back seat
customer_reviews.author: oula

customer_reviews.title: Take it here. Take it there. Take it everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Take it on long car rides, late night driving long distance and camping. All to avoid NASTY bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Kibbles

customer_reviews.title: they appear to be easy to use and convenient
customer_reviews.text: We have not had the need to use the Go on the Go Disposable Bags yet, but they are in our cars now and give our family confidence and peace of mind. If needed, they appear to be easy to use and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It works well for me. Now, for emergency ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well for me. Now, for emergency I do not have to go around for an open eatery or shop to unload my bladder fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio R. de Vera

customer_reviews.title: Practice makes perfect..
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but I recommend a trial run especially if you plan to use it for kids... great on a road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Very useful product..
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful product especially on the go with kids . Its made our lives easier..so it Will be my companion in all my travel
customer_reviews.author: arwa kurdi

customer_reviews.title: Easier to find a nearby tree when hiking or camping but could use in the car if needed
customer_reviews.text: I had higher hopes for this product. I have boys and am used to them just finding a nearby tree. I usually do the same in hiking and camping situations. I bought these to use while hiking and camping but then had to keep the garbage to dispose of. I think this would be good in the car if cought in traffic maybe? But the nearby drivers would definitely see what your'e doing-but when nature calls I guess this would help in that situation?
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A Foley

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I advise everyone who travels often to invest in these
customer_reviews.author: Fenecia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for car rides
customer_reviews.text: My son gets car sick frequently and having these close by has been very beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Lukas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super convienent! It turns liquids into a more solid gel like consistency that’s super easy to discard.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Feeling safe and secure-luckily haven’t needed to use yet!
customer_reviews.text: I travel by Amtrak quite often and have heard many stories about what happens when the toilets stop working! That does concern me so I always keep a similar item to this one in my little suitcase. Been lucky so far and never needed the original ones I purchased nor this type either. I’ll be happy if I miss out on that particular experience. I changed to this brand after doing a little research as the batch I had was getting travel weary from going on so many trips with me. So I’m now rearmed and ready!!
customer_reviews.author: Dietbuddy

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your camping trip.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works exactly as advertised. A must have when you go camping, makes life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Evita

product_meta.title: Go On The Go Disposable Urinal and Vomit Bags for Female and Male, Take Along for Travel, Traffic, Hiking or Camping - 6 Urinal/Vomit Bags Bonus 15 Cleansing Wipes Included
product_meta.description:
Go On The Go Disposable Urinal and Vomit Bags for Female and Male, Take Along for Travel, Traffic, Hiking or Camping - 6 Urinal/Vomit Bags Bonus 15 Cleansing Wipes Included

We've all been in that situation where we're stuck without a bathroom after downing a beverage. Then we're left with the discomfort of finding somewhere to go. Go On The Go has a better way!
Our hygienic disposable bag turns into an instant toilet on the go for whenever and wherever you may suddenly need one. It was designed with just these emergency moments in mind. The wide opening and unisex adapter make it work for every person, regardless of gender, age or body differences. With the 20 oz. capacity, you don't need to worry about it overflowing during your flow. Plus, the included cleansing wipes complete the bathroom experience.
Best of all, each bag contains an absorbent chemical which instantly turns your urine into gel, preventing spills. Even if you don’t have access to a trash receptacle right away, the safe seal will keep the gel contained in the leak-proof and odorless bag until you can throw it away. These convenient bathroom bags can even double as vomit bags. 
This Go On The Go package includes 6 pouches to keep you and your loved ones prepared for various scenarios. Each compact bag is simple to store in a car, a camping pack, a boat or a plane, and various other places where you might end up stuck without a bathroom. Store some and bring some in your bag to have an instant bathroom with you wherever you go.
feature_bullets: GELS INSTANTLY - Every bag contains an absorbent chemical that instantly the bag contents to gel so you don't need to worry about spilling
WIDE OPENING - The wide opening adapts to fit everyone regardless of age or gender and it ensures it is mess free
ODORLESS - The chemicals that turns the urine into gel also prevents and odors
COMPACT - It is lightweight and small enough to take along with you wherever you go where you might need it
CLEANSING WIPES INCLUDED - 15 cleansing wipes included to complete the bathroom experience
